entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
